parameters: bg_maybe2
4th Asan default 3
Teizoku entered a somewhat small tatami-matt room with
a table in the center. Sitting on the opposite side
was a maid.
<Yako> Welcome to the Gakidaki maid cafe Master! I am
very delighted that you chose me. My name is Yako, but
you can call any other name that you want to.
<Teizoku> Er, hi Yako. My name is Teizoku (should I
have said my real name?), nice to meet you.
4th Asan default 2
<Yako> Teizoku-sama, it is a privilege to be with you
here.
Teizoku scratched his ear after turning a tint pinker.
<Teizoku> Gosh Yako you are making me embarrassed. Are
all maid-cafes supposed to be like this?
<Yako> Tee-hee, of course this is what Master payed
for.
Teizoku felt self-conscious.
<Teizoku> What if I called you Yako-sama and praised
you non-stop? How would you like that, Yako-sama?
4th Asan quizzical
Yako sat silent for a second, and started to laugh.
4th Asan upturn 2
<Yako> Haha! Teizoku-sama is funnier than most
masters! Yako is entertained.
<Teizoku> Hey now, I’m not trying to be funny!
Teizoku was interrupted by a knocking on the door. A
maid walked in carrying a tray of food and drinks.
Yako got up and received it and brought it to
the table.
4th Asan default 2
<Yako> Is this Master’s first time at a maid-cafe?
<Teizoku> Yeah, why? Do I look like a first-timer to
you?
<Yako> Hehe, well most Masters tend to be older than
Teizoku-kun, it is refreshing to talk to someone
around Yako’s age for a change.
<Teizoku> Is that so? How old are most of the Masters?
<Yako> Middle-aged, mostly salarymen and otaku. An
occasional salary-women as well.
<Teizoku> Don’t they have better things to do with
their time?
4th Asan default 3
Yako thought for a moment.
<Yako> Tokyo is a lonely city, maid cafes are one of
the few ways for people to feel less isolated and less
alone, even if they have to pay for this setting and
it's only for a limited amount of time.
4th Asan upturn
Yako hesitated, as if not sure if she should speak
further, but decided to continue.
<Yako> It is hard for us to open up to one another at
the workplace, so maid cafes are themed in this
fantasy and unrealistic style as a way to give
permission for people to open up for a brief time.
4th Asan default 2
<Yako> At least that’s what Yako thinks.
An inner voice of Mako flashed before Teizoku’s eyes
and spoke out of his throat.
<Teizoku> What an incredible sales pitch, you’d make
for a great business manager Yako-tan.
4th Asan intense
<Yako> Heeey, Yako was serious, don’t tease Yako!
Teizoku chuckled.
<Teizoku> Hahaha, I’m kidding. That’s a very neat idea,
I never thought about it in this way. I always thought
that these places only weird people go to.
4th Asan default 2
<Yako> Master, well master is sitting here with Yako
right now inside this maid-cafe.
<Teizoku> Err, yeah...
<Teizoku> Well I am weird, so it’s fine I don’t mind.
Teizoku sipped the green tea Yako poured for a minute
of silence.
<Teizoku> Yako, why do you wear a mask and sunglasses?
4th Asan default
<Yako> Teizoku-sama, why do you wear clothes?
Teizoku raised an eyebrow.
<Teizoku> Well I don’t want to be naked, I would be
embarrassed if I was naked.
<Yako> Then you understand why I wear a mask and
glasses.
<Teizoku> Aren’t those sunglasses and not glasses?
<Yako> These are glasses dear Master, however they
have tinted black due to the smoke from my...
4th Asan upturn 3
<Yako> Ah, Yako spoke too much...
Yako put her hands over her mouth.
Teizoku faked a sneeze.
<Teizoku> Achoo! I didn’t catch that last part.
4th Asan default
<Yako> Ehem...
4th Asan default 2
Yako looked relieved.
Yako seemed to sit up more straight.
<Yako> Yako finds it interesting that Master picked
Yako for his first time, may Yako ask why is that?
<Teizoku> Yeah the receptionist Maid said you were
weird and that I should pick some other maid, but I
don’t know I kinda like your weirdness so I told her
that I wanted you anyways.
<Teizoku> (I like photographing unique things,
but I can’t tell her that now)
4th Asan default
<Yako> Oh, Master certainly knows how to make a girl
blush.
Teizoku blushed.
<Teizoku> Ahh, it’s not like that! Just thought that
I don’t know, uhh er, here I want more food!
<Yako> Sure, what would Master like?
<Teizoku> Anything! I don’t know, a donut!
<Yako> One donut coming right up hehe, I’ll be right
back Maaster.
Yako left the room to fulfill Teizoku’s order.
Teizoku sat fuming.
<Teizoku> (Ah! That girl shouldn’t take what I say in
the wrong ways! I’m just here to get her picture!)
Teizoku sat sipping the rest of his tea.
<Teizoku> It looks like we are approaching the time
limit. I won’t extend today, I’ll come back some other
time.
Yako came back to the room with a donut.
4th Asan default
<Yako> Here Master, I will feed you, say ahnn~
<Teizoku> Yako, this is too much for me for today. I
can’t take this, I will permanently become red as a
tomato. Here, just pack it up for to-go, we are
approaching the time limit anyways.
<Yako> Hehe, I think Master would make for a very
cute tomato inside my garden at home. But okay, I
will pack it up for Master for today.
<Teizoku> Please Yako, no more, no more.
<Yako> Hehehe, just teasing. Here’s your donut. I
had fun spending time with you today Master, I hope
you come back and choose Yako again.
<Teizoku> I had an interesting time too Yako, I’ll
be back.
Teizoku paused.
<Teizoku> Maybe I won’t choose you again because you
toy with my emotions too much.
4th Asan upturn 3
Yako looked a bit scared.
<Teizoku> I’m joking too, of course I’ll pick you
again.
4th Asan intense
<Yako> That was mean master!
<Teizoku> Haha, take that! See you later Yako.
4th Asan default 2
Yako bowed.
<Yako> Have a good day Master.

Yako thought for a moment.
<Yako> I really admire her courage to speak openly
about herself. The place where I grew up, it was not
welcomed to talk honestly about a lot of things, so
it was a huge inspiration to see her be like that.
<Teizoku> Do you want to be like her?
<Yako> Yeah, I wanted to live my life like her, with
courage and honesty.
Yako looked a little bit sad.
<Yako> But it’s still difficult.
<Teizoku> I feel similarly, I also struggle with
finding what I want, knowing what’s right and what to
do at a lot of times.
<Teizoku> We’re both young and not really adults yet,
I hope we can find a way to make ourselves remain
connected, like your singer, to something beautiful
without losing sight of it.
<Teizoku> It's hard isn't it?
<Yako> It is hard Tei-kun.
<Teizoku> To grow up in this world, being pulled into
so many different directions, uncertainty abounding
unrelenting, what can we do here?
<Teizoku> I think we can only be honest, that’s the
only thing.
<Teizoku> That’s the only way to face the truth and
problems of life without losing all hope and sight of
yourself. Even if everything else falls apart, you
will still be you at the end.
Teizoku looked down and saw that Yako was gently
holding his hand, caressing his fingers.
<Yako> Tei-kun...
Teizoku coughed back a sniffle
<Yako> What is your honesty?
<Teizoku> I don’t know Yako.

<Teizoku> Even if we don’t know, I think we’ll be okay

<Teizoku> I don’t mind it, but I wouldn’t want you

<Yako> Tei-kun, you are teasing me again.

<Teizoku> What’s up?
<Yako> We are out of time, that’s my alert to remind
us.
<Teizoku> That’s okay Yako, I’ll come back some other

Yako started playing with her hair and looked away.

<Yako> Bye-bye Tei-kun!
